Message: Hey your apps been buffering and slow and not accepting xp more often than before. The windows are fine, I've been using this app for a while now, and I even bought the buff pass. Can you guys do something about this? It's going to be annoying if I can't complete the buff pass because the app is bugging out more than usual. For more specifics, I keep getting the "something went wrong" refresh button. Before it was something like 1 out of 10 times it wouldn't accept xp. Now it wouldn't accept xp about 2 out of 3 times. If possible can I get back the xp I've been losing out on? If not please fix this.
accept:
Dear valued customer,

Thank you for reaching out to us and bringing this issue to our attention. I apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced with our app's performance and functionality. 

I understand how frustrating it can be when an app buffers, slows down, and interrupts your experience. This situation, especially when it affects your ability to complete the buff pass, is not what we want for our users.

I assure you that we will do everything in our power to resolve this issue promptly. Our technical team is already investigating the problem, especially the "something went wrong" refresh button you mentioned, and working on a solution to improve the app's performance.

Regarding the XP you have lost, we will review your account and determine if it is possible to reimburse you for the XP that was not accepted. However, please note that this will depend on our internal policies and any limitations that may apply.

Once again, I apologize for the inconvenience caused and appreciate your patience while we work on resolving this issue. If there's anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to let us know.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Company Name]
ask_questions:
I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues with our app. I understand how frustrating it can be when it buffers and performs slowly, especially if you've purchased the buff pass and are unable to complete it due to bugs. 

To assist you better, could you please provide some additional information? 
1. What device are you using to access the app?
2. Have you tried using the app on any other devices? 
3. Is your internet connection stable and fast?
4. Have you recently updated the app to the latest version?
5. Could you please share any error messages or codes that you have received?

Once I have these details, I will be better equipped to address the issue and assist you further. Your patience is highly appreciated. 

Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and I assure you that our team will work on resolving the issue as soon as possible. We value your loyalty and want to ensure that you have a smooth experience with our app. 

If necessary, we will do our best to compensate for any XP you may have lost. 

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions or concerns. 

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. 

Best regards,
[Your Name]
decline:
Dear customer,

I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing buffering, slow performance, and issues with accepting XP in our app. I understand how frustrating this must be, especially since you've been using the app for a while and even purchased the buff pass.

While I can appreciate your request to have the lost XP reimbursed, I'm afraid I won't be able to assist with that. However, I assure you that our team is actively working on resolving these issues to provide a smoother experience for all our users.

Your feedback is important to us, and I will make sure to pass it along to the appropriate team for further investigation and improvement. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

If there's anything else you'd like to share or if you have any further questions, please let me know. I'm here to help.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
goodbye:
I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing buffering, slowness, and issues with accepting XP on our app. I can understand how frustrating that must be, especially since you've been using it for a while and even purchased the buff pass.

I apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. Rest assured that we will look into this issue and do our best to find a resolution. We value your feedback and will make sure to address these performance issues promptly.

Regarding the lost XP, I'm afraid we might not be able to retrieve it, but we'll do our best to fix the issue so that you don't face any further loss.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. If you have any additional details or if there's anything else we can assist you with, please let us know. We appreciate your patience and understanding.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
confirm:
I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues with our app. I understand how frustrating it can be when the app is buffering, slow, and not accepting XP as expected. We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you, especially when you have purchased the buff pass. Rest assured, we are here to help.

To further assist you with this matter, could you please provide more details? Such as the specific device you are using, the operating system version, and any recent changes you may have made to your device or app settings? This information will help us investigate the issue thoroughly and find a suitable solution for you.

Regarding the XP you've lost out on, while we cannot guarantee any refunds at this moment, I assure you that our team will do their best to resolve this issue promptly. Our goal is to provide a smooth and enjoyable experience for all our users.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We truly appreciate your patience and understanding. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let us know. We're here to assist you.

Rest assured, I'll definitely escalate this issue to our engineering team so that they can investigate and resolve it as soon as possible. They have the necessary expertise to identify and fix the underlying problems causing the app to bug out more frequently than before.

Regarding the lost XP, I understand your concern. While I'm unable to guarantee a resolution on this matter, I'll make sure to communicate your request to the engineering team as well. They will take your feedback into consideration when working on resolving the app's performance issues.

Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention, and I apologize once again for any inconvenience caused. We appreciate your patience and understanding. If you have any other questions or concerns, please feel free to let me know.

Message: user [Irenendirangu2016]: Dear Sir/Madam, Good Afternoon, I would like to inquire if you have an agent in Nairobi Kenya whom we can contact to assist us with booking your ferry services . i have  two adults who would like to book the ferry services from Dare-salaam to Zanzibar on the 01st OCT . Also advise if you provides transfer from FERRY station to the hotel Park Hyatt hotel in Zanzibar. Your assistance will be highly appreciated. Kind regards, Irene Ndirangu
accept:
Dear Irene Ndirangu,

Thank you for reaching out to us. We appreciate your interest in our ferry services. 

I'm happy to inform you that we do have an agent in Nairobi, Kenya who can assist you with booking the ferry services from Dar-es-Salaam to Zanzibar on the 1st of October for two adults. 

Regarding your inquiry about transfers from the ferry station to the Park Hyatt hotel in Zanzibar, I regret to inform you that we do not provide transfer services at the moment. However, I can suggest alternative options for you to consider.

Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we will do our best to assist you in any way we can. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help you with.

Kind regards,
[Your Name]

To assist you with your booking, may I kindly ask:
1. Are you looking to book a one-way or round-trip ferry service from Dar-es-Salaam to Zanzibar?
2. Could you please provide the date of return from Zanzibar (if applicable)?
3. Do you have any specific time preferences for the ferry departure from Dar-es-Salaam?
4. Will you be traveling with any children or infants?
5. Could you please provide your contact information, including your phone number and email address?

Regarding your query about transfer services from the ferry station to Park Hyatt hotel in Zanzibar, we do provide such services. Once we have the necessary details, we will ensure a seamless transfer for you.

Thank you for your patience and cooperation. We look forward to assisting you further.

Warm regards,

Message: 1. user [Mjime0918]: Buen día. Tengo una cuenta en la plataforma Inkitt y resulta que desde la semana pasada ellos han enviado el pago y no ha llegado a mi cuenta de Paypal. Me informaron que debía comunicarme con ustedes para solucionar este inconveniente, necesito saber que hacer para recibir el p
accept:
[Agent:] Buen día, Mjime0918. Lamento escuchar que estás experimentando problemas con el pago de Inkitt. Entiendo lo frustrante que puede ser cuando se espera un pago y no se recibe. Permíteme ayudarte con esto.

[User Sentiment: Neutral]

Por favor, ten en cuenta que como representante de la plataforma Inkitt, estoy aquí para brindarte la asistencia necesaria. Sin embargo, debes comunicarte directamente con el equipo de soporte de Inkitt para resolver este problema. Ellos cuentan con los recursos y la información necesaria para investigar lo sucedido y ayudarte a recibir el pago correctamente en tu cuenta de PayPal.

Te recomendaría ponerse en contacto con el equipo de soporte de Inkitt a través de su sitio web o a través de su correo electrónico de soporte. Ellos podrán brindarte una solución específica para tu caso y te guiarán paso a paso en el proceso de recibir el pago en tu cuenta de PayPal.

Lamento no poder solucionar este inconveniente directamente, pero estoy seguro de que el equipo de soporte de Inkitt hará todo lo posible para ayudarte.

Si tienes alguna otra consulta o si necesitas alguna otra asistencia, no dudes en hacérmelo saber. Estoy aquí para ayudarte en lo que necesites.

[Residual Message:]Espero que puedas resolver este problema pronto. Agradezco tu paciencia y comprensión mientras trabajas con el equipo de soporte de Inkitt. ¡Que tengas un excelente día!

[Salutation:]Atentamente,
ask_questions: [Agent]: Buenos días, Mjime0918. Lamentamos escuchar que estás experimentando problemas con el pago de Inkitt. Para poder ayudarte de la mejor manera posible, necesitaríamos algunos detalles adicionales. ¿Podrías brindarnos tu nombre de usuario en la plataforma Inkitt? También, ¿me podrías decir si has recibido algún tipo de confirmación por parte de ellos sobre el envío del pago?

Kindly, 

Hello and good day, Mjime0918. I hope this message finds you well. I understand that you are facing an issue regarding your payment from Inkitt to your PayPal account. However, I regret to inform you that I am unable to assist you with this matter. I recommend reaching out directly to Inkitt's customer support team for further assistance. I apologize for any inconvenience caused, and I hope your issue gets resolved soon. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, please feel free to let me know.

Message: Hi - Can we add a 2nd listings page for our website? Basically we want to keep the homepage with all of our listings, but make a second page of listings that are just pet friendly. I can't figure out how to do it on Guesty. Thanks!
accept:
Hi there! I understand that you're looking to add a second listings page to your website specifically for pet-friendly listings. I apologize for any confusion or difficulty you may have encountered with Guesty. Rest assured, I'm here to assist you with this.

To add a second listings page for pet-friendly properties, you'll need to follow a few steps. First, log in to your Guesty account and navigate to the homepage editor. Look for the option to add a new page or section to your website. Once you've created the new page, you can customize it to display only the pet-friendly listings.

If you encounter any specific challenges during the process, please don't hesitate to reach out to me for further assistance. I'm here to make sure you have a seamless experience. 

I hope this information helps you accomplish what you're looking for. If you have any other questions or need additional support, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help.
